alert.note: Alert for Elbert; Lincoln (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 3:59PM MDT until July 26 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Elbert County in east central Colorado... Southwestern Lincoln County in east central Colorado... * Until 445 PM MDT. * At 358 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rush, or 34 miles southwest of Limon, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Kutch around 415 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Punkin Center and Forder. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
